about_the_game:
Welcome to Paradise!

In Paradise Girls, you are the proud owner of the Blue Ocean Beach Resort, a tropical getaway where the sun always shines, and beautiful girls await. Live the dream as you manage your time, explore the island, and forge connections with a huge cast of vibrant and charming women of all types who live in Paradise Cove.

The Choice is Yours

Each day is yours to shape. Will you relax by the pool, check on the resort’s guests, or explore secluded spots on the island? Meet the lovely ladies who call the resort their paradise and discover their unique personalities, desires, and secrets.

Romance and Challenge

As your relationships deepen, unlock special moments by testing your skills in a tile puzzle game. Complete the special puzzles and unlock stunning adult content and intimate scenes with each character.

Features:

  • Dynamic Visual Novel Gameplay: Immerse yourself in an engaging story filled with light-hearted humour, romance, and choice-driven interactions.

  • Easy to Play Tile Puzzles: Every successful romance unlocks different puzzles that reward you with beautiful, adult-themed content.

  • Diverse Cast of Girls: Get to know a variety of personalities—from the carefree beach babe to the mysterious island beauty. Each girl has her own story and rewards to uncover.

  • Freedom of Choice: Plan your day and decide who you want to spend time with. Explore all the paths to find your perfect paradise.

  • Adult Content: Unlock sexy and alluring adult CG scenes as you romance the girls and complete their challenges.

Are you ready to turn the Blue Ocean Beach Resort into the ultimate paradise?

Dive into the sun-soaked world of romance and puzzles—your adventure awaits in Paradise Girls!
